articles.title: Site arrival checklist
articles.summary: A 2-minute checklist to prevent rework and speed up closeout.
content: Confirm ticket details before entering the site.
Capture LED states and any visible errors.
Take label photos before making changes.

articles.title: Basic network triage
articles.summary: Isolate link vs IP vs upstream quickly before escalating.
content: If no link, reseat cable or swap known-good cable.
